data.name: Masterplan Tycoon Demo
data.detailed_description:
Masterplan Tycoon was born on a gamejam in 2018 from a simple idea - what if we cross node editors and a simulator of the construction of a settlement? Sounds geeky, but if you're scared - don't get scared... Let's forget this paragraph and start over...


Masterplan Tycoon is a minimalistic settlement building simulator. First, get a tree and cut it into planks. Then take care of the stone. You can get water from pond. More food will be needed ... Hmm. So, one more time!


Masterplan Tycoon is a strategy about building old school settlements. Provide supply chains with resources. Improve technologies and create new ones. And then there are missions...

Oh, okay. You will figure it out. Do not launch a rocket into space!

data.short_description: Masterplan Tycoon - is a minimalistic settlement building simulator. Grow your colony, research new technologies and colonize all available space. How big system can you create?
